channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenImageIO Project -- OpenImageIO
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenImageIO Project -- OpenImageIO

item.title: CVE-2023-22845|2024-07-31T20:15:19.844Z -- openimageio%20project -- openimageio
item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the TGAInput::decode_pixel() functionality of OpenImageIO Project OpenImageIO v2.4.7.1. A specially crafted targa file can lead to information disclosure. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-24473|2024-07-31T20:15:42.351Z -- openimageio%20project -- openimageio
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the TGAInput::read_tga2_header functionality of OpenImageIO Project OpenImageIO v2.4.7.1. A specially crafted targa file can lead to a disclosure of sensitive information. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-24472|2024-07-31T20:15:41.356Z -- openimageio%20project -- openimageio
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the FitsOutput::close() functionality of OpenImageIO Project OpenImageIO v2.4.7.1. A specially crafted ImageOutput Object can lead to denial of service. An attacker can provide malicious input to trigger this vulnerability.
